original_title: Nothing Changes: Art for Hank's Sake
overview: How far would you go to pursue your passion? At 87 years old, Hank Virgona commutes to his Union Square studio six days a week and makes art. Despite poor health, cancer, lack of revenue and obscurity as an artist, Hank is unrelenting in his quest to understand how life and art are the same.
title: Nothing Changes: Art for Hank's Sake
